metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14863 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: There is a vulnerability in all angular versions before 1.5.0-beta.0, where after escaping the context of the web application, the web application delivers data to its users along with other trusted dynamic content, without validating it.

criterions.comment: angular.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
